TopicTitle: Delta V showing 0 even with just under 5000 m/s ASL

Articles.Content: While I was building a rocket, the VAB's delta V counter showed a total of just under 5000 m/s of delta V at sea level. However, when I went to the launchpad, the delta V counter said I had 0 delta V, despite nothing changing. Does anyone know what's going on?
